resources.string: A simple game of snake with a few settings you can twiddle around with. The game was implemented with RxJava2 handling the game logic and OpenGL ES2 to display the game\'s state. The app uses many Android Jetpack components such as Navigation for a single Activity design, ViewModel and LiveData to preserve state upon a device configuration change as well as Preferences for, wellâ€¦ Preferences.
